last_episode_to_air.name: Redemption (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: While on the trail of an arsonist, the commish notices that all the clues point to the wife father's.

name: The Commish
overview: Tony Scali is a former Brooklyn cop now the Police Commissioner of a small upstate city. But for Scali, this is no desk job. He's a tough yet compassionate boss, a loving husband and father, and a hands-on law enforcer with an unorthodox style of bending the rules. From parenthood to politics, from sex crimes to murder cases, one man takes it day-to-day with offbeat humor and street- smart skill.

episodes.name: In the Best of Families
episodes.overview: Tony is threatened with criminal negligence after the son of a prominent lawyer hangs himself in his cell.

episodes.name: Do You See What I See?
episodes.overview: The commissioner sets out to trap a serial rapist in a Santa Claus mask who's been terrorizing the city.

episodes.name: The Poisoned Tree
episodes.overview: Rachel refuses to believe Tony when he tells her that her school teacher colleague, Jim Hollister, is a child molester.

episodes.name: Nothing to Fear But ...
episodes.overview: After receiving a pair of baffling death threats, Tony initiates around-the-clock surveillance of his unsuspecting family.

episodes.name: A Matter of Life or Death (1)
episodes.overview: Tony initiates a sweep to find a pair of missing cops; devises an ingenious way of keeping an habitually drunk driver off the road; and deftly handles an "extraterrestrial," all the while being scrutinized by a committee searching for a new police commissioner for New York City.

episodes.name: A Matter of Life or Death (2)
episodes.overview: Two missing cops have been found under water, there a jail hunger strike going on and tony's up for the nypd commissioner job.

episodes.name: Behind the Storm Door
episodes.overview: Tony is pursued by a woman he suspects is filing false complaints.

episodes.name: The Hatchet
episodes.overview: Tony butts heads with both a tough cop who is overzealous in his handling of criminals, and a hard-nosed management consultant hired by the city in a cost-cutting effort.

episodes.name: Two Confessions
episodes.overview: Tony is doubly stymied when identical twins both initially confess to the same murder, then, in a surprise about-face, accuse each other of the crime. Also, Arnie finds romance with a kindred soul, a phone-sex operator named Gloria.

episodes.name: Commissioner's Ball
episodes.overview: A serial killer has been mutilating the bodies of Eastbridge tradsients and homeless people - and Tony begins to suspect the perpetrator's identity.

episodes.name: No Greater Gift
episodes.overview: During the holiday season, Tony investigates the murder of an elderly woman allegedly killed in her home during a Christmas burglary; matches wits with a mugger, and defends a homeless woman who's been sleeping in the manger of a Holy Family creche.

episodes.name: The Fourth Man
episodes.overview: After Commissioner Scali's friend and colleague, Chief of Detectives Irv Wallerstein, is struck down during a bloody encounter with hijackers, Tony becomes obsessed with finding the assailant!

episodes.name: Charlie Don't Surf
episodes.overview: Vietnamese gangs threaten Eastbridge and Tony steps in to help.

episodes.name: Skeletons
episodes.overview: A mugging triggers a woman's repressed mernosy of her brother's murder, which she witnessed as a child. The suspect, free for the past 35 years, is tracked to the unlikeliest of hiding places by Tony and a visiting friend, L.A. homicide detective Paulie Pentangeli.

episodes.name: The Wicked Flee
episodes.overview: After seeing his mother killed by a stranger, a boy withdraws deep into himself, prompting a sympathetic Tony to step up his efforts to catch the murderer.

episodes.name: True Believers
episodes.overview: The unwelcome appearance in Eastbridge of white supremacists leads to a murder, with the suspicion soon arising that one or more of Tony's associates may be implicated.

episodes.name: Officer April
episodes.overview: After he shoots a woman in a drunken domestic squabble, Officer Kelly becomes the victim of a terrorization campaign.

episodes.name: Sex, Lies, and Kerosene
episodes.overview: Tony and Paulie investigate a puzzling arson case in which the husband of a beautiful woman appears to have been murdered.

episodes.name: Judgement Day
episodes.overview: Tony winds up in one of his own jail cells when he runs afoul of an imperious judge who's hiding a fearsome secret.

episodes.name: Shoot the Breeze
episodes.overview: Tony attempts to protect an informant from a mysterious hit man, while Stan Kelly enjoys a romantic encounter with a beautiful new Eastbridge arrival.

episodes.name: Video Vigilante
episodes.overview: Tony is embarrassed, then enraged, as a publicity-seeking "video vigilante" metes out even more bizarre and harsh punishment to offenders.

episodes.name: The Puck Stops Here
episodes.overview: Mike Cermak - star high-school hockey player, recovering addict, and good friend of the Scali family - becomes a prime drug-ring suspect.

episodes.name: Adventures in the Skin Trade (1)
episodes.overview: A freind of tony daughter is missing so he and pauli pose as porn film investors to found out the truth.

episodes.name: Adventures in the Skin Trade (2)
episodes.overview: Tony escape from the kidnappers with the help of the porn producer and then they pursue a film entrpreneur.

episodes.name: Guns & Sons
episodes.overview: David is the only witness to a shooting involving his best friend and a bullying classmate. Tony pursues the case unaware of David's knowledge of the shooting.   The victims father skeptical of police justice, plans to mete out his own. Tony arrives in time to stop a crime of vengeance.

episodes.name: The Rolodex Madam
episodes.overview: Tony is astonished to discover a wealthy socialite is the proprietor of a prostitution ring. The socialite is murdered, but not before   Tony's name is discovered in her rolodex of clients.

episodes.name: The Witches of Eastbridge
episodes.overview: The town is in shock when a haert is cut from a corpse at the funernal home meanwhile the town believes a recluse taints halloween treats.

episodes.name: The Two Faces of Ed
episodes.overview: A old freind of tony who is having marital trouble could be causing deadly incidents.

episodes.name: Escape
episodes.overview: Rachel redecorates as one of tony's freind who harbors a secret is under target from a escaped convict.

episodes.name: A Time to Be Born
episodes.overview: When Rachel is in labor, Tony is keep away from her due to a friend's crisis.

episodes.name: Witness
episodes.overview: Rachel becomes a target for a killer after she witnesses a murder while she was grocery shopping.

episodes.name: Sleep of the Just
episodes.overview: While Tony suffers from lost of sleep over being a new father he puzzles over a rapist who has diplomatci immunity.

episodes.name: The Frame
episodes.overview: A notorious racketeer comes to New York and in turn the crime rate rises.

episodes.name: Stoned
episodes.overview: Things are not going so well for Tony, first, his new car was stolen, right in front of him. Next he is informed that a patient from psychiatric hospital, Arlo Manno, has just escaped, and that he is some kind of egotistical, maniacal genius, who wants to, among other things, fly an airplane, perform a medical procedure, and join the police department. And it's not going to be easy to find him, cause he is also a chameleon, who is truly a man of a thousand faces. And Tony also has a kidney stone, which means that he has to go to the hospital, Which leaves Syd in charge.

episodes.name: The Heart is a Lonely Sucker
episodes.overview: While Stan is having problems protecting Carmela from a curse, Tony thinks that a video dating cliernt is a homicidal thief.

episodes.name: The Sharp Pinch
episodes.overview: Tony is looking for a very ill infant who has been kidnapped.

episodes.name: Dead Cadet's Society
episodes.overview: When the baby arrives david behavior gets worse meanwhile a militaristic preppies disappears.

episodes.name: Family Business (1)
episodes.overview: The Eastbridge crime rate raises when a retired mobster and his son comes to town.

episodes.name: Out of Business (2)
episodes.overview: When Tony son dies is a shootout Collette vows to make Tony pay by killing him.

episodes.name: The Ides of March
episodes.overview: While surrounded by conspirators, Tony thinks himself to be like Julius Caesar, meanwhile a man takes his ex-wife hostage.

episodes.name: Blue Flu
episodes.overview: The town in Eastbridge is under trouble as crime runs rampant due to a wage dispute which causes Tony men call in sick.

episodes.name: Eastbridge Boulevard
episodes.overview: A new reality police show comes to town meanwhile a former movie star is implicated in her ex lover's murder.

episodes.name: Sight Unseen
episodes.overview: A young blind women is in trouble as a rapist preys on her meanwhile Rachel makes an investment in art.

episodes.name: The Anti-Commish
episodes.overview: Tony got a mysterious call from someone who can help in a drug dealers murder, meanwhiel Rachel gets a good job offer from buffalo.

episodes.name: Suffer the Children (1)
episodes.overview: A juvenile center is in trouble when the head of the center is linked by Tony to a young runaway's suicide.

episodes.name: Suffer the Children (2)
episodes.overview: The second part of this 2 parter the find the remains of the runaway in the juvenile center head cabin.

episodes.name: Scali, P.I.
episodes.overview: Rachel is join by Tony in buffalo as Tony quits his job, but he then clashes with his replacement.

episodes.name: Burned Out Case
episodes.overview: A drug dealer who was responsible for a girl death is release by tony. also Rose and Kelly go under cover at a local burger joint.

episodes.name: The Set-Up
episodes.overview: Rachel is being framed for murder after Tony's probe of a criminal network goes wrong.

episodes.name: Rising Sun
episodes.overview:
Tony's city-council pal won't vote for a Japanese businessman's purchase of prime Eastbridge real estate.

In a second short story arch, Sean and his pales are flock of juvenile delinquents rob a flower shop.

episodes.name: Hero
episodes.overview: The Scali babysitter accuses an Eastbridge high school quarterback of rape, Tony must investigate despite the mixed feelings of the community. Stan's ego is bruised when his girlfriend knocks out a man who punched Stan.

episodes.name: Dying Affection
episodes.overview: Tony and Rachel are driven mad by Mark and his new drum kit, mean while a former boyfreind of Cyd called Mark is under suspicion as a stalker of Cyd.

episodes.name: All That Glitters
episodes.overview: Stan's fiance, Monica is implicated in assisting in a robbery. Tony discovers Monica was previously in trouble with the law before with her old boyfriend. Meanwhile, Rachel puts Tony on a health plan.

episodes.name: Mansion
episodes.overview: Amanda Hannington Wallace, the wife of a local multi-millionaire, is found dead her her mansion. When the autopsy is performed, the coronor advises Tony that the death does not look like an accident.

episodes.name: A Little Heart
episodes.overview: When a donor heart meant for a sick little girl is stolen, Tony heads up a team of detectives bent on finding the heart before anything can happen to it or the little girl. The thief makes themself known when he contacts her desperate parents and demands a $75,000 ransom for the missing heart.

episodes.name: Benny
episodes.overview: Rachel's cousin Benny is a used car salesman, and Tony doesn't know what to believe when a case involving the murder of a young woman leads him right back to Benny's used car lots. When Tony realises that Benny is involved in drug smuggling, he gives Benny one last chance to explain himself.

episodes.name: Keeping Secrets
episodes.overview: The recent beatings of many members of the homosexual community prompts Hank Radovich to come out to his fellow officers, none of which are very accepting of the news. While investigating the beatings, John Hibbs is himself taken hostage and beaten, and although he was initially disdainful of Hank's sexual preference, he learns to accept his partner and friend.

episodes.name: Dog Days
episodes.overview: Cyd finds the body of a young woman who appears to have died from an overdose of angel dust, but the only witness is a young man named Billy, who the opposing side ridicules because of his physical and mental handicaps. Further investigations lead the cops to a number of recently missing dogs.

episodes.name: Father Eddie
episodes.overview: When a young Puerto Rican, Marco Espinoza, is found next to the corpse of his former girlfriend, he is arrested and charged with her murder. Father Baxter begs Tony to help and convinces Tony that Marco was unconscious at the time of the victim's death, but when Baxter admits to Tony that he is Marco's father, Tony can't trust the priest's word about Marco's whereabouts.

episodes.name: Bank Job
episodes.overview: Tony and Rachel have a fight, and Tony begins throwing himself into his job. When Rachel is taken hostage in a bank robbery and also forced to go on the road, Tony tries his best to get her back, but the FBI soon assumes jurisdiction over the case, leaving Tony out of the loop.

episodes.name: Romeo and Juliet
episodes.overview: After the body of Gary Ellis is found, the case soon leads Tony to Gideon Ellis, the father of David's boyfriend Sheri. Tony demands that David stop seeing Sheri, but David rebels, and he and Sheri run off together.

episodes.name: Security
episodes.overview: Although Tony promises round-the-clock protection to a homeowner after a devastating break-in, they can't trust the police, and decide to get a security system of their own.

episodes.name: Dead Drunk
episodes.overview: When Joe Thompson's wife is killed by a drunk driver leaving him with an eight-year-old daughter, the investigation leads to prominent surgeon Harris Clark, who has a history of drunken driving. Clark gets off on a technicality, and when he is found dead, suspicion turns to Thompson.

episodes.name: The Letter of the Law
episodes.overview: Rachel is surprised when Abby Davenport is violently opposed to her daughter Linda being featured in a picture spread, and soon after that, the two disappear. When Tony catches up with them, Abby reveals that her real name is Marcia Daniels, and that she and Linda are on the run from Linda's father, who sexually molested her, but who, thanks to influential connections, has legal custody.

episodes.name: Sergeant Kelly
episodes.overview: More than anything Stan wants to become a sergeant, but the sergeant's test isn't the only obstacle in his way. He also needs to prove that he can follow a case from start to finish. Tony assigns him to the case of drug dealer Terry Ross, which he figures won't be that hard for Stan. Stan soon falls for Gail, Terry's estranged wife, and starts to think everything will be okay.

episodes.name: The Iceman Cometh
episodes.overview: The force must rally themselves after Stan's death in a car explosion. Tony feels particularly bad, because he can't forget that he was the one who assigned Stan to work on the Ross case in the first place. After promising Stan's parents that he will find the man who killed their son, Tony launches a full-scale war on Terry Ross, not realising that Ross has hired someone to take care of the Scali family once and for all.

episodes.name: Against the Wind (1)
episodes.overview: After being struck with a ball, Tony is hospitalized and it looks like he is going to be permanently paralyzed. But his family refuses to give up on him, and enlists the help of physiotherapist Dan Boylan to help him walk again. With Tony out of commission, Cyd is put in charge of the murder investigation of officer Joe Ratowski.

episodes.name: Against the Wind (2)
episodes.overview: Tony's attempts at physical therapy are proving unsuccessful, and despite the love and support of his family he is beginning to lose hope that he will ever walk again, and is preparing to spend the rest of his life in the wheelchair. Cyd has the chance to take a job out of Eastbridge, but doesn't want to leave Tony in a noose. While she considers her decision, she continues to work on the Joe Ratowski murder case, which is looking more and more like an 'inside job'.

episodes.name: Working Girls
episodes.overview: While investigating an armed robbery, Tony goes undercover and hires an escort to get some important information. He is shocked to see his friend Ralph's daughter, who is barely 18, show up, preparing to spend the night with him. Tony convinces her to get out of drugs and prostition and promises not to tell her father, but when tragedy strikes, Tony has no choice.

episodes.name: Born in the USA
episodes.overview: Isaac and Grace Caldwell are illegal immigrants who own and operate a small electrical shop. After they witness a murder, Tony has to convince the two to testify, which he does by promising them citizenship. They agree, happy that the child Grace is carrying can be born in America, but joy turns to tragedy when Isaac is shot.

episodes.name: Who Do You Trust?
episodes.overview: While an officer who is posing as a crooked cop in order to expose a crime ring which be be the genuine article who has problems as tony also suspects him.

episodes.name: Nancy with the Laughing Face
episodes.overview: While working on an embezzlement and a kinapping case Paulie starts to becomes to emotionally involved.

episodes.name: Revenge
episodes.overview: A corrupt ex-officer that Tony imprisoned seeks revenge upon his release.

episodes.name: Head Case
episodes.overview: Tony uncovers a plot to frame an innocent man for a murder of a patient which he didn't commit, because of his discovery Tony gets drugged and held in a psychiatric clinic.

episodes.name: The Lady Vanishes
episodes.overview: An old student of Rachel starts hinting at people that his seem his stepmother commit murder.

episodes.name: Ghost
episodes.overview: Tony was forced to suspend a cop when the cop was found guility for the unprovoked killing of a thief. Things gets stranger when Tony sees the thief alive.

episodes.name: A Christmas Story
episodes.overview: An old friend of Tony gets his life back on track with help from a retirement hotel resident.

episodes.name: Hidden
episodes.overview: A mob boss keeps watch over Tony who is helping a man find his wife and son and also while he is protecting witnesses who saw a gang slaying.

episodes.name: The Johnny Club
episodes.overview: David is caught shoplifting, mean while Tony finds out that a accident victim was in debt to a loan shark.

episodes.name: The Golden Years
episodes.overview: A gangster who Tony's mother was dating is found killed. The main suspect is Tony's father.

episodes.name: Accused
episodes.overview: Tony is accused of sexual harassment by an computer technician.

episodes.name: The Trial
episodes.overview: Tony dreams of a film noir mystery, mean while a man holds a mock trail.

episodes.name: Cry Wolf
episodes.overview: While trying to solve a major gold robbery, Tony must reply for help from a con man.

episodes.name: Brooklyn
episodes.overview: A murder of a fellow cop, make Tony and Paulie travel to Brooklyn to help investigate the case.

episodes.name: Letting Go
episodes.overview: Tony and Rachel are in emotional turmoil awaiting results of Rachel's breast cancer test results.

episodes.name: The Kid
episodes.overview: A hopeless teenager gets a help from Tony and Paulie.

episodes.name: Off Broadway (1)
episodes.overview: While investigating the murder of his friend's daughter, tony gets help from a New York police officer.

episodes.name: Off Broadway (2)
episodes.overview: Tony and Connie Muldoon close in on the serial killer, Connie's daughter might be the next victim.

episodes.name: In the Shadow of the Gallows (1)
episodes.overview: Tony faces the biggest challenge of his career when an murder case from his past resurfaces.

episodes.name: In the Shadow of the Gallows (2)
episodes.overview: Tony faces the biggest challenge of his career when an murder case from his past resurfaces.

episodes.name: Father Image (1)
episodes.overview: During a high - profile serial murder case a old mentor of tony becomes involved with the case.

episodes.name: Father Image (2)
episodes.overview: During a high - profile serial murder case a old mentor of tony becomes involved with the case.

episodes.name: Redemption (1)
episodes.overview: While on the trail of an arsonist, the commish notices that all the clues point to the wife father's.

episodes.name: Redemption (2)
episodes.overview: While on the trail of an arsonist, the commish notices that all the clues point to the wife father's.
